Content-Type: text/plain; charset=UTF-8

*Control room:*

"Indeed, Rodimus Prime was a member of our group until a short while ago,"
Kenzo replied.  "I believe you may have met his child, Elita back in the
shuttle.  Both Rodimus and Nightlight were captured by Hydras   When our
teams attempted a rescue, Rodimus began attacking them.  Hydras must have
tampered with him somehow, turned him.  We have a shaky truce with Hydras at
the moment.  But we haven't been able to negotiate the return our comrades."


*Elsewhere:*

Suddenly a transmission came over the air.  Peresus' team was now too far
inside the base to get the signal, however back at the shuttle Salveo was
startled out of a daydream by the sudden voice.


OOC: I believe Lord Elder and his team are still guarding the Ark.  Also, I
think Legacy was already active:
http://games.groups.yahoo.com/group/nbwrpg/message/69251


On Jan 29, 2010 9:39 PM, "Sandy" <magicquartz@...> wrote:

While resting, Tucson could not help but think about what possibly happened
to his Autobot comrades.  He had put out a call but no one had replied.  He
wondered if it were possible that he may be the sole surviving Autobot and
that the Maximals were the mainstay of Cybertron.  He could hear Kenzo in
the room, and he was anxious to know if his leader, Rodimus Prime, and his
other friends were still functioning.

"Kenzo, I - don't remember much before meeting up with Lord Perseus on
Atlantis.. Before I - met you, I - was helping Rodimus fend off a Decepticon
attack.  I- got shot, and that was that.  I - don't remember anything else..
 Is - Rodimus Prime still alive?  And are - the other Autobots still alive
as well? I tried - to contact them but - got no response.  I'm - a bit
concerned.  Am I the only one left or - are there others still functioning?"


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Kraftlos <kraftlos@...> wrote:
>

> "Alright, Talon and Ravenchief come with me. Guardia can lead the entrance
> team," said Perseus ...

> On Jan 29, 2010 8:15 PM, "Sandy" <magicquartz@...> wrote:
>
> Tucson had been resting a while sin...
